confirmed_facts: HYBE Music Group APAC donated 500â€¯million KRW (â‰ˆ2.66â€¯million HKD) to support victims of the Hongâ€¯Kong highâ€‘rise apartment fire.
The donation was made through Hope Bridge National Disaster Relief Association and will be used via a Hongâ€¯Kongâ€‘based nonprofit to assist bereaved families.
The donation was announced on 2025â€‘11â€‘28 by Hope Bridge president Im Chaeâ€‘cheong.
HYBE Music Group APACâ€™s six labels issued a joint statement expressing condolences.
